sense.def:
To shuffle somewhere
pomeni hoditi ali iti nekam tako, da ne dvigamo nog od tal.

seg.quote: He shuffled out of the room.
We recognized him by his distinctive walk, a kind of shuffle.

sense.def:
To shuffle
pomeni nemirno se premikati, ko sedimo ali stojimo, ker nam je neudobno ali smo v zadregi.

seg.quote: I was shuffling in my seat.
I shuffled my feet and mumbled.

sense.def:
To shuffle a pack of cards
pomeni prerazporediti komplet igralnih kart pred začetkom igre.
